thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Singapore's GIC Buys Shares Of Qingdao Haier, Shareholder KKR Home Investment Sells Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Singapore's GIC Buys Shares Of Qingdao Haier, Shareholder KKR Home Investment Sells Shares
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Qingdao Haier Co Ltd:
* SAYS SHAREHOLDER SINGAPOREâ€˜S GIC HAS BOUGHT A-SHARES IN THE COMPANY ON FEB 8, TAKING ITS HOLDINGS TO 4.8 PERCENT AFTER TRANSACTION
* SAYS SHAREHOLDER KKR HOME INVESTMENT HAS UNLOADED 121.9 MILLION A-SHARES IN THE COMPANY AT 18.09 YUAN PER SHARE ON FEB 8, TAKING ITS HOLDINGS TO 5.94 PERCENT AFTER TRANSACTION
* SAYS SHAREHOLDER KKR HOME INVESTMENT REMAINS COMPANY'S BIGGEST INSTITUTIONAL SHAREHOLDER AND STRATEGIC INVESTOR Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FZqpHD Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
